# mPacketDescriptionCapacity

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of packet descriptions that can be stored in the `mPacketDescriptions` field.

## Declaration

```swift
var mPacketDescriptionCapacity: UInt32 { get }
```
title: mPacketDescriptionCapacity
